content: Once the Cloudtreading Deer is down, you'll receive the Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders, and it's time to continue the sweep of the mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Deer Sight Forest' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudtreading Deer'.
The content is as follows:
Once the Cloudtreading Deer is down, you'll receive the Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders, and it's time to continue the sweep of the mountain.
